name: Speed Grower
description: Speed Grower is the first game I have published for a game jam. This game is published for Ludum Dare 51 in the Extra submission category. The theme for this jam was "Every 10 Seconds" and I decided to make a farming game where a new plant grows every 10 seconds. The goal of the game is to get as many carrot coins as possible without filling the plot and loosing the game.
